Slideshow

This is the slideshow component. It can be displayed in a hero banner format with a side banner, in a hero format with a description for each slide, or as a standard image carousel. Looping, slide/fade effect, and pager/control nav can be controlled via data attributes on the outer wrapper.

Hero slideshow with banner:

Conducting research and treatment studies that focus on the brain and disorders of memory, mood and aging.

Conducting research and treatment studies that focus on the brain and disorders of memory, mood and aging.
